New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds.
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for South Africa 79-9
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 101 off 119 balls
India recorded a score of 326 for 5 wickets
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and chose to bat
The pitch offered a bit of grip and movement
Virat Kohli was expected to perform well due to his birthday
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed gratitude for the moment and his teammates
Experts noted India's dominance and questioned if any team could stop them in the final
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ravindra Jadeja's left-arm spin caused significant problems for South Africa
South Africa struggled to score runs throughout the innings
